data.name: Pin Puck Demo
data.detailed_description: Master the controls of your oddly shaped player to claim victory in this local-multiplayer competitive sports game. Quick reactions and stealthy steals are a must if you want to outscore your opponents in the field. This demo is local multiplayer focussed for 2-4 players, and includes 3 of the maps available in the full game.
data.about_the_game: Master the controls of your oddly shaped player to claim victory in this local-multiplayer competitive sports game. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
